casebody.data:
LEDER
v.
LEDER. No. 509P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 19, 2004. Jason D. Witt, for Joseph Leder. Charles B. Brooks, Monroe, for Mary Ellen Leder.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of October 2004 by Appellant (Joseph Leder) for Extension of Time to File Affidavit:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 18th day of October 2004."
